name: T8JA
description:
T8JA is a Top Down Beat 'Em Up with robots made by three fourteen year olds.. The year is 2058. You play as T8JA, a robot made for gladiator fights. T8JA has the ability to learn and adapt.

Music by Lara Jakšić.

If the game lags, try going to the installation files, opening options.ini and changing the Sleep Margin to 15.
